if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("…"))
yell(playerName+" Has logged in.");

item.title: Adding a ::yell command ? PI
item.dc:creator: @warxscape warxscape
item.description:
@warxscape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:24, topic:527362”]That’s because the client handles the chat differently than the yell.
The client automatically sees player rights in chat and adds the crown, it doesn’t for yell.
like vain said you can try @cr0@ @cr1@ @cr2@[/quote]
i have that dont work, how do i change the engine like u said

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a ::yell command ? PI
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

You can modify the client to draw the crown upon any string. Try using @cr2@ or @cr1@
Or update the text engine.

item.title: Adding a ::yell command ? PI
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

try

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=838383>[Yell]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } } }else{ c.sendMessage("You cannot yell while muted!"); return; } }

UPDATE: Ok great

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a ::yell command ? PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell"))  {
	if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
		for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
				Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
				c2.sendMessage("<shad=838383>[Yell]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
				+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}
		}
	}else{
		c.sendMessage("You cannot yell while muted!");
		return;
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a ::yell command ? PI
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

Here is my ::yell command, hope it works

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“YELL”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“yel”))
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652>[HOST]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                    + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652>[CODER]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                        }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=838383>[Head-Co]</col><shad=838383>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                        }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=838383>[Head-Admin]</col><shad=838383>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=200000000>[Admin]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[Mod]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                        }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=330000>[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                        }else if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.isDonator == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                        }else if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.isDonator == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Super Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=000000>[Player]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								
						}
					}
				}[/code]

just change the playername you want to the one you want and you can change the name tags too, also the super donator yell may be a bit different for you

Read full topic
